Boynton_Beach.Park Vista Community High School:
Park Vista Community High School (PVCHS, PVHS, PV) is a public high school in Lake Worth, Florida, United States.
Park Vista Community High School is one of the top-rated high schools in Palm Beach County, earning a Golden School Award by Palm Beach County each year since its inception. The school offers four academies (Information Technology, Television and Film, Medical, and Automotive), which students follow to act as their high school "major" and imparts various skills to apply to college and/or the job market.
